answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!You have to first find the cause why the wound is not healing—underlying infection, diabetes, low blood supply or infection of the underlying bone. Once this is treated then only skin graft and other such procedures will be effective. Please consult a wound clinic. Hope this helps. Take care!

question: I've had 5 skin grafts done on an open wound on my ankle, which has not been closed in 5 years since the first surgery. What else is left to get the wound to heel?
title: 5 year old open wound
